name: Mainstays Kids' Sports Patch Coordinated Bedding Set

reviews.name: Mainstays Kids' Sports Patch Coordinated Bedding Set
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this bedding set. It is very warm and soft. The colors are very vibrant. Looks great in my sons bedroom!
reviews.title: Super cute bedding/Great quality

reviews.name: Mainstays Kids' Sports Patch Coordinated Bedding Set
reviews.reviewText: Yes, I am pleased with my purchase. I purchased 2 for the price of one as I was pricing online before I came across on Walmart's web. Made well, not cheaply sewn together. My grandson, who the purchase was for, is very happy with his new addition to his new room. Brightens up the room with brilliant colors and can be paired with many other colors as well. Perfect gift for a little boy in sports. Thank you!
reviews.title: Very Nice for the price!

reviews.name: Mainstays Kids' Sports Patch Coordinated Bedding Set
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 2 sets for my boys (age 3 &7). I received them and was pleased instantly! It came in a cute package, neatly packed, and labeled (fitted, flat,ect.) The colors are very bright and my 7yr. old exclaimed over how soft it was. I agree with him and love the feel of the fabric it feels sort of silky. I just received it today so I cant confirm how the color holds after a wash or two but it looks like a material that will have a lot of wear and still have saturated color. I am very pleased with everything about this set!
reviews.title: Soft, great quality, and excellent value!!!

reviews.name: Mainstays Kids' Sports Patch Coordinated Bedding Set
reviews.reviewText: The set is very colourful and appears to be well made. My son loves all the sports that are on it! FYI: it does not come with a bedskirt! I just thought that most bed in a bag's did, but I had to purchase one at Wal-Mart separate which was an extra $14.
reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!

reviews.name: Mainstays Kids' Sports Patch Coordinated Bedding Set
reviews.reviewText: This was the best ..My teenager loved it..Great ..
reviews.title: Bedding Set
